text: White Nights () is a 1959 Soviet drama movie directed by Ivan Pyryev.Художник- постановщик "Мосфильма" Стален Волков умер в возрасте 93 летБЕЛЫЕ НОЧИ (1959) It stars Lyudmila Marchenko, Oleg Strizhenov, and Anatoli Fedorinov. == Actors == * Lyudmila Marchenko as Nastenka * Oleg Strizhenov * Anatoli Fedorinov * Svetlana Kharitonova * Yakov Belenkiy * Yevgeniy Morgunov * Vera Popova == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1959 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Ivan Pyryev
title: White Nights (1959 movie)
